Global Function show_dir()

show-dir() - Show a directory. Asks for a filemask and then shows the directory contents, matching the mask. If the window for the mask was escaped with ESC_KEY, then don't show the direcory

void show_dir ( void )
HISTORY: 911211 V0.1 - Initial version
